content.raw:
`CreateFilter` function in the above line performs an additional step to find CollisionPtrs based on the vector of names passed in, but in this case it's already available from this function's `_collisions` argument. 

So I did a little refactoring to avoid looking up CollisionPtrs again, see [fix_gripper_filter](#!/osrf/gazebo/compare/fix_gripper_filter..fix_gripper#diff) branch. Moved code for initiating `ContactPublishers` here in this function
content.html:
CreateFilter function in the above line performs an additional step to find CollisionPtrs based on the vector of names passed in, but in this case it's already available from this function's _collisions argument.

So I did a little refactoring to avoid looking up CollisionPtrs again, see fix_gripper_filter branch. Moved code for initiating ContactPublishers here in this function
